titles.title: Agricultural Export Bonus Act of 1987
A bill to amend section 1127 of the Food Security Act of 1985 to modify the export incentive program created by that section.

bill.summary: 2/25/1987--Introduced. Agricultural Export Bonus Act of 1987 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to limit the export incentive program to countries that either agree to at least three-year contracts or satisfy minimum purchase requirements. Prohibits the delivery of program commodities to 32 specified countries.
